About Me

This is Myo Thant Kyaw (Eric), currently working in an international marketing and purchasing specialist position at Assist Engineering Co., Ltd, and also studying MBA at the University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce at the same time.

I found this job opportunity shared by my university. After reading the JD carefully, I strongly believe that I have the potential to be a qualified candidate for this position to overcome challenges in a new industry because of the following reasons:

  • MBA candidate with an engineering background
  • Proven track records of achievements in Thailand and Myanmar with referees
  • Proven 1.5 years in Thailand and 2.5 years in Myanmar, working in sales & business development roles in the construction industry of both countries
  • Experienced in coordinating and liaising with international stakeholders and customers from China, Singapore, and Western countries at my current job
  • Possess professional English skills, basic Thai speaking skills, and native Myanmar speaker
  • Conducting WordPress website management at the current job and skilled in using other marketing tools integration
  • Strong analytical and interpersonal skills to coordinate and liaise between internal teams and outside parties
